column2: "Nna asɔr a ɔwɔ Antiok no
column3: nkɔnhyɛfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo bi wɔ mu
column4: hɔn nye Barnabas nye Simeon a wɔfrɛ no Niger nye Lusius
column5: Sirenenyi no nye Manaen a wɔtsetsee ɔno nye ɔmansinhen Herod bɔɔ mu no

column2: "Na aber a wɔrosɔr Ewuradze
column3: na woridzi mbuada no
column4: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no see hɔn dɛ
column5: Hom nyi Barnabas nye Saul mma me ma wɔnkɛyɛ edwuma a osian ntsi ma mafrɛ hɔn no."

column2: "Nna wodzii mbuada
column3: na wɔbɔɔ mpaa dze hɔn nsa guu hɔn do
column4: na wogyaa hɔn kwan."

column2: "Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no somaa hɔn dɛm no
column3: wosii mu kɔr Selusia
column4: na wofii hɔ nam hɛn mu kɔr Siprus."

column2: "Na wodur Salamis no
column3: wɔkaa Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no wɔ Jewfo nhyiamudan mu; na wonyaa John so dɛ hɔn somfo."

column2: "Na wotwaa mu wɔ supruw no mu kodur Pafos no
column3: wokohun osumantunyi nkɔnhyɛnyi torfo
column4: Jewnyi bi a ne dzin dze Bar-Jesus a"

column2: "ɔwɔ ambrado Sergius Paulus a ɔyɛ ɔbadwembafo no nkyɛn. Ɔno na ɔfrɛɛ Barnabas nye Saul
column3: na ɔpɛɛ dɛ otsie Nyankopɔn asɛm."

column2: "Na Elimas nkongyaayinyi no (mbrɛ ne dzin ne nkyerɛase tse nye no) siiw hɔn kwan
column3: na ɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ ɔdan ambrado no fi gyedzi no ho."

column2: "Na Saul a ɔnoara so wɔfrɛ no Paul a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ahyɛ no ma no
column3: dze n’enyi tsiim no do
column6: Wo a ndaadaa nye emumuyɛ nyina ahyɛ wo ma
column9: ana innkegyaa dɛ ekontom Ewuradze no kwan a ɔtsen yi?"

column2: "Na afei
column3: hwɛ
column4: Ewuradze nsa da wo do
column6: na irunnhu ewia dze ekesi da bi. Na amonmu hɔ ara na fua nye sum dwiir no do
column7: na okyinii hwehwɛɛ binom a wobosuo ne nsamu akyerɛ no kwan."

column2: "Aber a ambrado no hun dza esi no
column3: ɔgyee dzii
column4: na Ewuradze ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛɛ no ahobow."

column2: "Na Paul nye hɔn a wɔnye no nam no tui fii Pafos
column3: na wɔbaa Perga a ɔwɔ Pamfilia: na John fii hɔn nkyɛn sanee kɔr Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wotwaa mu wɔ Perga no
column4: wɔbaa Antiok wɔ Pisidia; na wɔkɔr nhyiamudan mu ahomgyeda kɛtsenaa hɔ."

column2: "Na wowiee mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo kenkan no
column3: nhyiamudan mu mpanyimfo no somae ma wɔbɛsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Enuanom
column5: sɛ hom wɔ afotusɛm bi ka kyerɛ nkorɔfo no a

column2: "Na Paul soɛree gyinae
column3: na onyinaam ne nsa kyerɛɛ hɔn see dɛ: Israel mbarimba
column4: nye hom a hom suro Nyankopɔn

column2: "Israelman yi hɔn Nyankopɔn no saan mu yii hɛn egyanom
column3: na ɔman no tsenaa Egypt asaase do dɛ ahɔho no
column4: ɔmaa hɔn do
column5: na ɔdze nsa a ɔkrɔn yii hɔn fii hɔ."

column2: "Na bɛyɛ mfe eduanan na osiee hɔn ho abotar dandaan hɔn wɔ sar no do."
"Na ɔbɔɔ amantɔw esuon wɔ Keenan asaase do no
column3: ɔdze hɔn asaase maa hɔn dɛ egyapadze
column4: bɛyɛ mfe ahaanan eduonum;"

column2: "na n’ekyir no ɔmaa hɔn atsɛmbuafo dze bodur nkɔnhyɛnyi Samuel do."
"Na nkyii wobisaa ɔhen; na Nyankopɔn dze Saul Kish ba no a ofi Benjamin ebusuakuw mu maa hɔn mfe eduanan."
"Na otuu no no
column3: ɔmaa David do hyɛɛ no hen maa hɔn
column4: ɔno so na ɔgyee no ho dase dɛ
column7: ɔbarimba a mankasa m’akoma da no ho: ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ m’apɛdze nyina."

column2: "Oyi n’asefo mu na Nyankopɔn nam anohoba do eyi Jesus ayɛ Agyenkwa ama Israel;"
"John dzii kan kaa nnuho enuma ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Israelman nyina ansaana ɔbae."
"Na John reyɛ ewie no dwuma dzi no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hom susu dɛ emi nye woana? Nnyɛ emi nye no. Na hwɛ
column5: obi dzi m’ekyir reba a mennsɛ dɛ mesan n’ananadze nsokota."

column2: "Enuanom
column3: Abraham asefo
column4: nye hom mu obiara a osuro Nyankopɔn no
column5: hɛn na wɔasoma nkwagye asɛm yi abrɛ hɛn."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm nye hɔn mu etsitsir
column3: osiandɛ wonnyim ɔno nye nkɔnhyɛfo no ndze a wɔkenkan no ahomgyeda nyina ntsi
column4: wobuu no fɔ ma ɔbaa mu."

column2: "Na woennhu biribiara a ɔfata wu wɔ no mu
column3: naaso wɔserɛɛ Pilate dɛ onku no."

column2: "Na wowiee dza wɔakyerɛw wɔ no ho nyina ma hyɛ no
column3: woyii no fii dua no ho dze no kɔtoo nda mu."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn nyaan no fii ewufo mu;"
"na oyii noho nda pii kyerɛɛ hɔn a wɔnye no fii Galilii baa Jerusalɛm: hɔn nye n’adasefo ma ɔman no."
column3: "#Ndwu 1.3"

column2: "Na hɛn dze
column3: yɛka hom anohoba a wɔbɔɔ egyanom no no ho asɛmpa
column4: , #Dwom 2.7"

column2: "dɛ Nyankopɔn ama aba mu ama hɛn mba
column3: dɛ oenyan Jesus; dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ ndwom a otsia ebien no mu dɛ
column4: Ɔwo nye me Ba

column2: "Na dɛ onyaan no fii ewufo mu ma ɔronnkɔ mprɔwee mu bio no
column3: ɔkaa no dɛm dɛ
column4: Mebɛma hom adom krɔnkrɔn a osi pi a medze bɔɔ David anohoba no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi so ɔka wɔ ndwom fofor bi mu dɛ
column3: Ennkɛma wo Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ehu mprɔwee."

column2: "Na David dze
column3: ɔsoomee wɔ nankasa ne santsen mu wiei wɔ Nyankopɔn n’apɛdze no
column4: ɔkɔr ne kra ekyir

column2: "na nyia Nyankopɔn nyaan no no dze
column3: oennhu mprɔwee."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: enuanom
column4: hom nhu dɛ ɔnam oyi do na wɔka bɔnfakyɛ kyerɛ hom;"

column2: "na ɔnam oyi do na ndzɛmba nyina a ɔnam Moses mbra do a hom enntum enndzi ho bem no
column3: obiara a ɔgye dzi no odzi ho bem."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ yie mma dza wɔkaa no nkɔnhyɛfo mu no aammba hom do
column3: dɛ;"

column2: "Hom nhwɛ
column3: hom atwetwesifo! Ɔnyɛ hom nwanwa
column4: na hom nhera: Osiandɛ mereyɛ edwuma bi wɔ hom nda mu
column5: Edwuma a obi ka kyerɛ hom mpo a

column2: "Na wopuei no
column3: wɔserɛɛ hɔn dɛ ahomgyeda bi so wɔmbɛka nsɛm yi nkyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔpoon nhyiamudan mu som no
column3: Jewfo nye nyamesurofo a wɔdan Jewfo no mu pii kaa Paul nye Barnabas do: na hɔn dze
column4: wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn tuu hɔn fo dɛ wɔntsena Nyankopɔn adom no mu."

column2: "Na ahomgyeda a odzi do no durii no
column3: ɔka kakraabi ma nkyɛ kurow mu no nyina ebehyia dɛ woribetsie Nyankopɔn asɛm."

column2: "Na Jewfo no hun nyimpadodow no
column3: nyinkun hyɛɛ hɔn ma
column4: na wɔkasae tsiaa ndzɛmba a Paul reka ho asɛm no gyee kyim

column2: "Na Paul nye Barnabas dze ndam kaa dɛ
column3: Ohia dɛ wodzi kan ka Nyankopɔn asɛm no kyerɛ hom. Na osiandɛ hom sun kyen
column4: na hom bu homho dɛ hom nnsɛ onnyiewiei nkwa no ntsi

column2: "Na dɛmara na Ewuradze ahyɛ hɛn dɛ
column3: Medze wo esi hɔ dɛ kandzea ama amanamamfo
column4: Ama aayɛ nkwagye ekodu asaase ano noho."

column2: "Na amanamamfo no tsee yi no
column3: wodzii dɛw
column4: na wɔhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn asɛm no enyimnyam; na dodow a woeyi hɔn ama onnyiewiei nkwa no wɔgyee dzii."

column2: "Na Ewuradze n’asɛm no tserɛwee wɔ asaase no nyina do."
"Na Jewfo no wee guu mbaa nyamesurofo a wɔwɔ dzin
column3: nye kurow no mu etsitsir no aso mu
column4: na wɔmaa ahohiahia kɛse baa Paul nye Barnabas do
column5: na wɔpaam hɔn fii hɔn nkwaado."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wɔporoporoow hɔn anan ho huntuma guu hɔn do
column4: na wɔbaa Ikonium."

column2: "Na esuafo no dze
column3: dɛw nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn hyɛɛ hɔn ma."
